name: Jafar Hakimi
story: Jabr Kushan was born and raised in Tehran, Iran. He grew up with a passion for marksmanship and joined the Iranian Revolutionary Guard Corps at the age of 18. After several years of service, he was recruited by the OPFOR to serve as a sharpshooter in their operations. Jabr is known for his calm demeanor and precision, but he keeps to himself and rarely speaks to his comrades.
